personalInfo.name: Irene Cid Rico
personalInfo.title: Computer Engineer & Senior Software Architect
personalInfo.summary: Senior Software Architect with 15+ years of experience in high-availability systems and a background in AI research. My expertise lies in building the robust backend infrastructures that clinical systems require to be reliable. My research focus includes developing novel ML techniques and Transformer architectures. Currently serving as a Professor of Software Architecture and Dean of COIIPA.

experience.company: Government of the Principality of Asturias
experience.role: Director General of Health Planning & Digital Strategy
experience.description: Led the regional digital health roadmap, focusing on security policies, risk management, and continuous improvement for Hospital Information Systems (HIS).
achievements: Launched AI-assisted medical reporting project
Automated digital pathology workflows
Spearheaded procurement of large-scale AI platform for diagnostics (Cuelebré Project)

experience.description: Collaborated in laboratory sessions for Software Architecture courses and participated in AI research groups.
achievements: Guided students in CI/CD, testing, and deployment
Research in educational text processing using AI (Python, Pytorch, Flask)
Published papers on AI in education

experience.description: Led the Official College of Computer Science Engineers, overseeing initiatives to promote engineering excellence.
achievements: Coordinated 'The Hour of Code' workshops
Co-organized Regional Computer Science Olympiads
Managed COIIPA News publication

experience.description: Computer Science Teacher at CIFP Avilés, responsible for Interface Development, Forensic Analysis, and Secure Deployment subjects.
achievements: Taught React, Node.js, and security practices
Led 'Digital Signature for Interim Staff' project (Angular, J2EE, Oracle)
Refactored personnel and teacher training applications

experience.description: Managed high-complexity technical tasks and led a team of 6 developers for CaixaBank Building Project.
achievements: Developed automated asset loading processes
Engineered complex PDF generation engines
Designed real-time alert and notification systems

experience.description: Service Manager for the National Postal Service (Correos) account.

Architected high-availability technology stack
Led end-to-end migration of PDAWEB application

Conducted deep-dive performance analysis

experience.description: Designed architecture for 'Asturias 112 Emergency Services Information System' project.

Designed system still in use by 112 operators

experience.description: Core member of search engine development team focusing on high-performance indexing.
